name: Bitcoiner
description:
All donations will go to help Ukraine!!!
Bitcoiner is a game where you can buy virtual crypto at a real-time price.

There is a field. You must write crypto abbr like BTC, ETH, DOGE and then search(Don't click search fast, you can be banned for a few seconds). After that, there will be another field "Amount", You just type the amount which you want(if you have enough money) or sell(if you have crypto). Good Luck)

There are 2 versions of the game:

Normal(Free):

  • You start with 1000$

Pro(Paid):

  • You start with 100.000$
  • You have 20BTC, 30SOL, 150DOGE, and 30ETH.
